Author: Gateway#3763
Content:
[dscrdvrsc] <MrCryptoCash-AcedPoker.io> Seen in another Discord, better safe then sorry

WARNING Telegram has made some updates to the platform and have made your Phone Number Privacy setting set to be able to be seen by Everyone in your contacts by default. You need to change it to "Nobody" People are being SIM hacked and having their Crypto Stolen, because of this lack of security.
Go to the Telegram App>Settings>Privacy and Security>Phone Number> select Nobody

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrdvrsc] <Oink> @MrCryptoCash-AcedPoker.io , already posted in #community-support by @FishyGuts , but thanks for the heads up!
